messages.title: Ex-Tory Euro MP joins Lib Dems
messages.content: Ex-Tory Euro MP joins the Liberal Democrats in support of candidate Lawrence Meredith, citing that the Lib Dems have the best policies on issues like the environment.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lib Dems oppose the Tory Snow Tax that could cost local shops and businesses thousands of pounds simply for clearing snow from their premises.

issues.health: Shock increases in Tory Care Costs highlighted.

leaflet.personalStatement: Lawrence Meredith has a personal statement regarding his connection to the local area, his family, and his commitments to the community as a Liberal Democrat.

endorsements.endorsement: Support and endorsement for Liberal Democrat candidate Lawrence Meredith.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet includes a call to action to 'Use Your Vote!' and provides local news updates from the Richmond constituency. It also focuses on addressing recent care cost hikes under the Tories, and introduces Lawrence Meredith with a brief biography.
